Text: Update and contact informationHi Jeff Hope you are well As promised I wanted to give you an update on the results of my job search I have accepted a position at Perseus LLC a private equity firm here in Washington As you may know the firm has offices in DC and NY and focuses on late stage venture investments in energy technology biopharma and other areas as well as buyouts and rollups in a variety of industriesincluding energy Understandably I welcome all the challenges and rewards which come with this new opportunity My new information is below after Perseus LLC Pennsylvania Ave NW th Floor Washington DC Work Phone Work and permanent email I check it all the time I look forward to keeping in touch Feel free to contact me if I can be of assistance in any way All the best Rajeev Do You Yahoo Get email alerts NEW webcam video instant messaging with Yahoo Messenger
